# addItem(withProductID:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the designated item to the user’s music library.

## Declaration

```swift
func addItem(withProductID productID: String, completionHandler: (([MPMediaEntity], (any Error)?) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
func addItem(withProductID productID: String) async throws -> [MPMediaEntity]
```

## Parameters

- **productID**: The product identifier for the media item to add.
- **completionHandler**: A block that the system calls after it plays the media item.



## Discussion

Use this method to add media items to a user’s music library. Use the [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/NetworkingInternetWeb/Conceptual/AppleMusicWebServicesReference/index.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40017625] to search for content contained in the iTunes, App, Book, and Mac App stores.
title: addItem(withProductID:completionHandler:)
